text: anite kelelitu huleti iji yaneseni gimashunimi sisowinimi yemitik’omi mehonihini getahi be’irigit’i yawik’ali፡፡ ke’ineziyami abirewihi kaluti kefilochi (yemik’omu mehonachewini yawik’ali)፡፡ alahimi lelitinina k’enini yilekikali፡፡ (lelituni) yematadarisuti mehonachihuni ‘awek’e፡፡ be’inanite layimi (wede mak’aleli) temeleselachihu፡፡ silezihi kek’uri’ani (besigideti) yetechalachihuni anibibu፡፡ ke’inanite wisit’i beshitenyochi፣ lelochimi ke’alahi chirota lemefelegi bemidiri layi yemigwazu፣ lelochimi be’alahi menigedi (hayimanoti) yemigadelu inideminoru ‘awek’e፡፡ (ak’alelelachewimi)፡፡ ke’irisumi yetechalechihuni anibibu፡፡ solatinimi sigedu፡፡ zekanimi sit’u፡፡ le’alahimi melikami biderini abediru፡፡ kemelikami sirami lenefisochachihu yemitasik’edimutini hulu irisu yeteshalena beminidami talak’i hono alahi zenidi tagenyutalachihu፡፡ alahinimi mihiretini leminuti፡፡ alahi bet’ami mehari azanyi newina፡፡
